name: Chronicles of Lurra
description: The Chronicles of Lurra is a free to play RPG set in the fictional world of Lurra. You follow Trent, the main character as he is dragged from his home through time and space to the world of Lurra.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Everything made since 2004 should work Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated works
